title: Vista Gamers Edition (by megaposter)
description:
Stumbled upon this post when searching through google for stripped down versions of Vista:
 <a href="
http://www.aioforum.com/windows_os/27289-windows_vista_gamer_edition_working_links.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.aioforum.com/windows_os/27289-windows_vista_gamer_edition_working_links.html</a>

The post contains Rapidshare links to a "Vista_Gamers_Edition_uploaded_by_megaposter"

Here those links are for those of you wishing to download via Rapidshare:


xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Heres the NFO from the ISO:

"*******************************************************************************
                        Windows Vista Xtreem 1.01 (internal)
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: OS
Release Name.........: Windows Vista Xtreem 1.01 (internal) 
Supplier.............: Donator
Part Size............: 15MB
Number of Parts......: 24
Compression Format...: RAR
Files................: Vista_Xtreem.r**
Image Format.........: ISO
Size of Image........: 351MB
Installsize..........: 696MB
Protection...........: keys;  Windows Product Activation
Requirements.........: Decent puter, minumum 256MB RAM (minimum check cracked)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
       This has been made for you that refuses to get assf***ed by M$ and 
       their allies whith the help of that DRM/TC/Palladium infested POS 
       that they call "best Windows ever"..!
       
       And with the introduction of DirectX 10 (that ofcourse will not be 
       available/ported to XP) they try lure us to give up our privacy and 
       freedom of choice regarding our internet and computing habits... 

       I like to play my games and REFUSE to install that crappy bloated 
       full blown Vista POS, so this has been made with my own preferences 
       and needs in mind.
       
       There is nothing here that will satisfy those who like that gayish 
       Aero Glass theme, actually there is no theme at all...the classic one
       is the only choice ;)
        
       Performance and simplicity is the key word here, this baby has been
       tweaked and tuned to simply blow your socks off!!
       
       There are some of you who know who I am and you know that this has
       been done properly, and no friggin "nlite/vlite buttonclicker" that
       hasn&#039;t got a clue on what they are doing....period.

       Everything, and I mean EVERYTHING that can be a threat to us and
       that are not needed for regular use and gaming has been removed.
       
       So understand this, there is:

                                NO Media Player
                                NO DRM module
                                NO .NET3
                                NO Firewall     
                                NO Search/Index function
                                
                                ...and a ton of other stuff!
                                
                  ..if you really feel you can&#039;t live without that, 
                        simply don&#039;t bother grabbing this. 
       
       
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                    Change Log
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------    


                             
       1.0  : Initial release
       1.01 : Removed forgotten autorun components, minor fixes. 
       
       
       
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                       Info
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------             
                                                

       I recommend you to download and install: 
       Kaspersky.Internet.Security.2006.v6.0.2.614.Final...
       
       It&#039;s one of the best suites you can get, very competent and 
       relatively light on resources as well.
       I would only install the &#039;File Anti-Virus&#039; and &#039;Anti-Hacker Firewall&#039;
       in that package, the rest is not really needed in my opinion and are
       only pulling resources.
       
       You can find it here:
      <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3609101" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3609101</a>
       
       ..or simply google for: 
       "Kaspersky.Internet.Security.2006.v6.0.2.614.Final torrent"
       
       
      

       There surely will be a few issues, but I don&#039;t think you will find
       many considering the extremly small install this is..(and light).

       Now, due to the lack of .NET functionality you ATI jocks will have
       to opt out for the CCC and manage with only the drivers.
       
       (A non-CCC fix for Crossfire is in the works, .NET is actually only needed
       when installing Crossfire.)
       
       Furthermore, you will have to remove these two files in
       system32 directory anfter install and before you reboot:
       

                                 ATI2EVXX.DLL
                                 ATI2EVXX.EXE
                                     

       If you don&#039;t remove them you will have an error at boot, nothing 
       serious but annoying enough.
       I&#039;m sure you can hold out until the Vista compatible Omega drivers
       are out..yes?

       Apart from that I&#039;m sure you will find this little gem to be a
       snappy little creature... ;)
       
       
       
       Change
       
       Have Fun!
       
       /Donator

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
.Unpack
.Burn to disc and install, ONLY BOOTABLE INSTALL SUPPORTED!!!
.Installkey is:  YFKBB-PQJJV-G996G-VWGXY-2V3X8 (Universal Key)
 OR Leave the cd-key field blank and install without a key."


xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


THIS THING WORKS! Reduced memory usage idle at desktop from 38% to 17% (2GB Corsair Dominator DDR2 1066). Jumped my FPS in Crysis it seemed about 7-15FPS to an almost playabe average of 28FPS with all settings HIGH (8800 GTS 512MB, 1680x1050)


Oh! Virus free according to G Data Antivirus 2008 ^^

ENJOY!!!! I SURE AM!!!!




*   Old Tom Bombadil is a merry fellow
    Bright blue his jacket is and his boots are yellow
    None has ever caught him yet, for Tom he is the master
    His songs are stronger songs and his feet are faster
